0.content: Bocconi University, Department of Economics Via Roentgen 1, 20136 Milan, Italy . giacomo.manferdini@phd.unibocconi.it @ManferdiniG manferdinig .

1.title: Curriculum Vitae
1.content: You can download my cv here. If you are not able to see the preview of the CV, please download the it using the link above.

3.title: Welcome!
3.content: . My name is Giacomo Manferdini and I am a first-year PhD student in economics at Bocconi University. My research interests lie in behavioral, labor, political, and public economics. Previously, after getting a M.Sc. in Economics from the University of Bologna, I worked as research assistant at the University of Bonn for Lorenz Goette and Egon Tripodi.
